entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy this morning. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
